name: RKN Simulator
description:
Comic game on the topic of blocking Telegram.
Feel yourself Roskomnadzor. Try to block the most popular messenger! Be careful, because you are able to block everything, even yourself, but not Telegram, although who knows...
Click on the emerging Telegram logos, again and again, trying to get through the game without having to click on the Roskomnadzor logo, because this will lead to defeat.

Features:
  • Soothing gameplay
  • Endless confrontation
  • The chance to block yourself
  • Steam Achievements
